data.title: Unrest and Inequalities: Comparing Welfare States
data.meta_description: The stereotype of Scandinavia is of a place of haunting natural beauty, a Utopian society, where blonde haired beautiful people lead idyllic lives (Murphy, 2010). The fashionable exterior of Stockholm, Sweden, embodies this. Citizens are imagined as enjoying a life...
